entry.title: FOG ADVISORY ENDED, North Battleford
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 07:05 AM CST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -14.9°C

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this morning. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 07:07 AM CST Friday 30 December 2022
